alert.note: Alert for Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 26 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT/715 PM EDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, Bay and Gulf. * WHEN...Until 615 PM CDT /715 PM EDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 412 PM CDT /512 PM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mexico Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wetappo, Allanton and Davis Beach. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
